category.name: Product Structure.Design Context.Filter Configuration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DesignContextOrphanBOMLineSupport
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the DesignContext Application in Teamcenter should provide the Orphan BOMLine support. Valid values are TRUE/FALSE. If this is set to "TRUE", DesignContext would load all it's parents till the top line is reached by default. If it is set to "FALSE", it would be treated as an orphan and would only be loaded on request.
